channel.title: « pkz-scape 317 »
channel.description:
[center][img]http://pkz-scape.us.lt/public/style_images/5_dfgdfg.png[/img][/center]
Hello, i won't take a lot of your time making you read this thread but I would like you to represent a 317 private server, which was released not too long ago, I would say about 2 weeks. Don't get us wrong, our name doesn't not say that our server is spawn, and its based on pvp. No, this server has good economy, all of your cash earned from mobs count's. You won't achieve all of your stats to maxed very fast and I can promise you, it won't be easy. Well about server? Our server has unique home I would say, it is Slayer Tower.
Some information about our server :
- Fun PK - Dice bag - Our forum based on Invision power board - All levels working - Cursor prayers! - A lot of updates! - Active community - Leveling up is not easy! - Completionist / Max capes - Different game settings options. - Good amount of minigames - 100+ Working achievements. - Crystal keys and chests. - Mystery and legendary mystery boxes. - Unique spot for pvp - PK BOX - Owner is making server by players opinions and suggestions. - Korasi sword with fully working damage and special attack. - More than 10 working bosses, including nex and nomad. - Perfect economy. - And much more...
[url=http://www.pkz-scape.us.lt]www.pkz-scape.us.lt[/url]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I72hve-1Ajs[/youtube]

item.title: « pkz-scape 317 »

item.description:

[center][/center]

Hello, i won’t take a lot of your time making you read this thread but I would like you to represent a 317 private server, which was released not too long ago, I would say about 2 weeks.
